title: My other app storage is showing as 19gb but only adds up to 3gb
content: I have just bought a pixel 3 and moved over from. iOS on my iPhone I used 16 GB of storage but I'm now using over 26gb 19 of which is taken up by others appd, when I've added each individual app storage amount it also only comes to 3gb
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
